resources.string: This app is built for Whiskey Lovers by a Whiskey Lover. The functionality of the app is for users to be able to look up several brands of whiskey and find out more information about it. It also includes the location of the distillery that the whiskey was made. Future plan is to include if any store near the user has the whiskey for sale

My name is Felix and I\'m the creator of this application. When I\'m not being a whiskey lover and programmer, then I\'m a geek who enjoys video- and boardgames, as well as just enjoying to meet new people and experience new things. And no, I also enjoy other drinks that aren\'t whiskey
